alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Magoffin; Morgan; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morgan, northwestern Magoffin, eastern Rowan, central Wolfe and Elliott Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Triplett to Leisure to High Falls. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Leisure, Craney, Haldeman, Blaze, Wrigley, Triplett, Gates, Pelfrey, Yocum and Zag around 535 PM EDT. Blairs Mills, Minor, Wagner and Hamm around 540 PM EDT. Lytten, Fannin Valley, Little Sandy, Farley, Wagner Store and Elliottville around 545 PM EDT. Sandy Hook, Daysboro, Rexville, Murphyfork, Lower Gilmore, Helechawa, Gilmore, Lee City, Upper Gilmore and Ezel around 550 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lizzielane, Demund, Newfoundland, Nickell, Payton, Sellars, Stark, Grassy Creek, Mize, Adele, Henry, Lewis, Stacy Fork, Panama, Greear, Caney, Holliday, Cannel City, Liberty Road, Lykins, West Liberty, Bruin, Well Station, White Oak, Gordon Ford, Malone, Williams, Index, Harper, Licking River, Florress, Cottle, Matthew, Cisco, Bloomington, Wonnie, Lenox and Lick Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
